"Playing a Short Melody":
"It's important to give people time to
take a breather at the event!
So, I had the idea to set up a Game
Corner at the venue so people can take
the weight off their feet.
I bet people's fatigue will just slip away
if they can play a game while they rest.
Let me hear some good ideas from you!

※Lv.1+ enemies or higher"
